entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sussex Four Corners 6:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: SSW 33 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of thundershowers early this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16 except minus 21 in low lying areas.
